Description.Text: Beijing Palace Soluxe Hotel Astana is a luxury 5-star property offering elegant accommodation near the centre of Astana. Highlights include a spa, swimming pool and multiple restaurants. Astana is a lively city boasting a fascinating history and a great range of restaurants, bars and shops. Nearby places of interest include the Presidential Center of Culture, the National Opera and Ballet Theatre and the Gorky Russian Drama Theatre. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Astana destinations. The hotel occupies a stylish high-rise property. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, gym, sauna and whirlpool. A range of massages and spa treatments are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 30sqm and decorated in a bright contemporary style. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe and en-suite bathroom. The Madonna restaurant offers European dishes in a relaxed and friendly setting. The Great Wall restaurant offers Chinese cuisine in an intimate environment. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
